Articles.Content:
I had a mun orbit then I detached from the main craft into my lander capsule and it seems that the other craft is following me or something?? 

Then I switched focus to the other craft and switched back to the lander and now the landers orbit is also on a crash course.

Also the map doesnt show where the sun is shining correctly.

 

The video explains it best

https://imgur.com/a/gAEqfVf
This needs more attention, I literally can't do anything with more than one ship in orbit

I had this bug too, the  only fix  i could find was loading a quicksave from before the lander detatched, then disabling the engines on both crafts (lander and command module) before going ahead with the landing and the dommand module in orbit should keep its orbit.
